channel.title: Blogs on CC Ozkan
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on CC Ozkan

item.title: beauty of rss
item.description: RSS might not be the newest technology in town. But damn it is effecient. In the age of noice of push notifications, this not disturbing delivery system has became how i consume the internet. From independent blogs (the non-kneelers part of social internet!),to big major publisher sites, podcasts and a lot of other platforms(reddit subreddits, youtube channels, etc) have native rss support. Some additional tools provide rss for non-supporting ones.

item.title: my rediscovery of radio streams
item.description: Years ago, I downloaded all my music and then like everybody else I switched to streaming. Listening tunes from youtube and spotify has its advantages. But I decided to take a step away from it. There are two reasons behind that escape plan listening same stuff over and over again all the “explored” music is been recommended by the algorithm Listening music on radio feels way more organic, and has a bit of of surfing taste.
